Privacy Preference Center

When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.

[Reject all cookies](https://www.donordock.com/pricing#)[Allow all cookies](https://www.donordock.com/pricing#)

Manage Consent Preferences by Category

Essential

**Always Active**

These items are required to enable basic website functionality.

Marketing

Essential

These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.

Personalization

Essential

These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.

Analytics

Essential

These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.

### **Donor Funded Fees**

DonorDock is committed to keeping our giving pages free for nonprofits

###### How do Donor Funded processing fees work?

**If the donor does not cover the processing fee:**  
Your nonprofit only pays the standard Stripe fee—2.2% + $0.30. DonorDock does not charge your nonprofit any extra platform fees!  
  
‍**If the donor chooses to cover fees:**  
They will be charged 5% + $0.30 and all credit card processing fees are covered for your organization! Making it **completely free** for your organization!

\*DonorDock's subscription fees apply for donor management and outreach features.

### Frequently asked questions

Is it easy to switch to DonorDock from our current system?

![Image 214](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

Yes, and we're proud of that! DonorDock is designed to make transferring your data simple and reliable using our self-guided import tool.

DonorDock was voted "Easiest to Setup.” We provide in-person demonstrations, detailed instructions and support, and an option for personal guidance through the upload process. [Learn more](https://www.donordock.com/migrate-your-data)

Will you help me get set up with DonorDock?

![Image 215](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

Yes! When you sign up for DonorDock, you'll get access to a variety of in-person resources, written guides, and videos, as well as live support.    
  
We know you'll have a better experience and get more value from DonorDock when you're supported during the set-up process. DonorDock is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, and our customer success team will help guide you through the onboarding process.

Who is DonorDock for?

![Image 216](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

*   DonorDock is for US-based 501(c)(3) charities.
*   DonorDock is designed to make fundraising, marketing, and data management easier for a variety of organization types.
*   People of all computer skill levels love DonorDock, and it supports a variety of use cases for different organizational needs.

Do you serve international customers?

![Image 217](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

Right now, we only offer support and services for customers based in North America. We plan to expand that in the future, so please reach out if you’re interested, and we can keep you up to date.

Do you have custom fields?

![Image 218](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

We don’t have custom fields per se. What we do have are badges on contacts and gift tags which are a flexible way for a nonprofit to customize DonorDock without the added complexity and maintenance that comes with true custom fields.

Do you offer event management?

![Image 219](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

We offer basic event tracking like ticket purchases. We also have native integrations to systems like [Classy](https://www.classy.org/go/) and [OneCause](https://www.onecause.com/) to make sure our customers can get the best of breed for event management and the best of breed for CRM.

[Read more](https://helpcenter.donordock.com/kb/guide/en/event-tracking-in-donordock-l9nJxVA7tH/Steps/2342409#:~:text=Search-,event%20tracking%20in%20donordock,-Events%20are%20a) about basic event tracking in DonorDock.

‍

Do you support volunteer management?

![Image 220](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

We have basic tracking for volunteer hours and dates of service, built right into DonorDock. If you need a more robust software that includes scheduling, we integrate with platforms like [VolunteerMatters](https://volunteermatters.com/).

Can DonorDock replace our email marketing tool, like MailChimp or Constant Contact?

![Image 221](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

For organizations seeking a simple way to send emails to their contacts, DonorDock is a perfect replacement. You can create, send and schedule bulk emails to marketing lists in DonorDock (as well as 1-to-1 emails to individuals). With automations, you are able to create drip campaigns that send to different segments of your donor base.

[Learn more about all of DonorDock's email marketing features.](http://www.donordock.com/donor-outreach)

What if I’m not sure how many emails I need, or my needs change throughout the year?

![Image 222](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

We recommend starting with the Essentials plan, our most popular plan. If you need more than 10,000 emails per month you can upgrade to Professional at any time (or reach out to us if you need extra emails for a short period of time).

Am I limited to a certain number of contacts, or does my price change as I add more contacts?

![Image 223](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ce9d04b1ff6e36cf514274/6425d1c6fed58f46ae90c306_icon-dropdownarrow-blue.svg)

No! Every plan offers UNLIMITED CONTACTS. Your cost won't grow over time as you add new contacts.
